DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal ( selfreported cessation menstruation 1 prior enrollment ) If breast cancer survivor , therapy complete least 6 month prior enrollment Agreed eat normal diet , avoid seaweed phytoestrogenrich food , Restricting alcoholic intake # 2 drink ( 24 g alcohol ) /wk Continuing habitual intake vitamin , supplement , medication study .
